dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and discovery.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I've been searching for the ancient artifact for weeks. I can feel its power calling to me.

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Bold
dialogues.text: Ah, Eira! I see you're still chasing after that mythic relic. What makes you think it's real?

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: The prophecy is clear: the artifact will bring balance to our troubled world. And I aim to be the one who finds it.
